titles.title: All Creatures of Our God and King (St. Francis of Assisi)

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}All creatures of our God and King, Lift up your voice and with us sing, Alleluia! Alleluia! Thou shining sun with golden beam, Thou silver moon with softer gleam, O praise Him! O praise Him! Alleluia! Alleluia! Alleluia!{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Let all things their Creator bless, And worship Him in humbleness. O praise Him! Alleluia! Praise, the Father, praise the Son, And praise the Spirit, Three in One! O praise Him! O praise Him! Alleluia! Alleluia! Alleluia!{/lang-eng}
